Funding and Boosting Web3 Revolutionary Products with Solid Teams

About us

Majinx Group is a team of head-over-heels devotees, ready to fire up the most revolutionary and promising Web3 startups at early stages. Our main call is to find the most extraordinary and promising teams, guiding them to new heights and beyond!

We don't just invest We craft success stories

As Majinx Capital, we are the guiding force during the crucial fundraising stage. But our role doesn't end there. We're full-time fans of the projects we work on both fundraising and scaling stages.

If you’ve got talent and sprite to success in this dynamic industry, then you've just found your perfect match! Let's Rock'n'Roll the foundations of the Web3 landscape together!

invest

Majinx Capital

Majinx Capital is a go-to venture fund for early-stage investments, making cool ideas happen! We're all about Infrastructure, dApps, DeFi, and other exciting stuff in the Web3 world. Looking for investors? Let's turn your ideas into reality! 

scale

Majinx Labs

Majinx Labs experts  provide long-term fundraising, marketing, advising, and audit services for solid Web3 teams. We're committed to supporting projects and boosting their scale beyond limits. Ready for boost? Press ‘Explore’!
